entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as leaving Harry and his friends to grope in the darkness without a map or plan. He is described as having left them to wrestle with unknown terrors alone and unaided.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being left by Dumbledore without a sword and his wand, and he has dropped the photograph of the thief which would make it easy for Voldemort to find out who he was.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as looking frightened that Harry might curse her with his wand.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as having all the information now and being able to find out who Harry was.

entities.name: thief
entities.description: The thief is mentioned as someone whose photograph Harry had dropped.

relationships.description: Voldemort has all the information now and can find out who Harry was.
Dumbledore left Harry without a map or plan, making him grope in the darkness.
